Languages.ENGLISH: Hey, finally someone taking care of this bar. I was dying for a beer. Haha, get it? 'Cause we're already dead... hahaha. Anyways, what are you doing here?
Wait, you mean you don't remember? But your soul is kinda white, never saw that before...
Bah, don't mind me. You're the barman now, aren't you? Serve me a cold beer, please.
Yeah that drain shoots something people like, and this bar outgrew some nasty and bitter plants, but that's exactly how beers taste like, why don't you train with those?
Ah, well not as expected, I can almost chew it... But somehow you'll come to what you need.
Oh, that reminds me, you need a payment don't you?

Look, we are dead, there's no currency, but people can still pay with help or information. For instance, I found this other roots that taste similar than the ones you have, but fells like they're burning your tongue.
...And it's kinda lighter than the one you put on my beer.
Hahaha not that I'm blaming you man. But everything tastes better with some talk, don't you agree?
Why don't you help me with that? Most people will reveal more if you just make them enjoy their drinks.
Huh... So you don't really remember. That's also new, but well, who am I to judge hahaha. I can't either at this point.
I just know we are in the soul realm, and you're very welcome. Just take care of your memories here... wait, I shouldn't talk about that haha forget it.
I was... hiding. Well, I'm not sure what's happening.
...I don't really know, I just remember a cat dragging me.
I think I'm a barman, it just felt... natural.
Where are we exactly?
Why are you in here?
Have you said we were... dead?
What do you mean I have a "white soul"?
People need to rest?
Is that everything you're gonna pay me with?
"Let him finish"
